response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking excellence in its category. Given its quality and functionality, I estimate its worth to be well above $80. To make it accessible to you, I propose a special introductory price of $120. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that could easily fetch higher prices elsewhere. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
